title: Linda Anderson: The Sewing Scribe of Silver City
summary: Linda Anderson, a 75-year-old with a love for writing and sewing, discovers her superpowers and protects her community from unexpected danger over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Linda Anderson, eine 75-jährige Liebhaberin des Schreibens und Nähens, entdeckt ihre Superkräfte und schützt ihre Gemeinde innerhalb einer Woche vor unerwarteten Gefahren.
summaryDutch: Linda Anderson, een 75-jarige met een liefde voor schrijven en naaien, ontdekt haar superkrachten en beschermt haar gemeenschap tegen onverwachte gevaren gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Linda Anderson, âgée de 75 ans et passionnée d'écriture et de couture, découvre ses superpouvoirs et protège sa communauté contre un danger inattendu au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Linda discovers she can sew costumes that endow the wearer with superpowers.
Testing her powers, she writes a story that magically becomes true, causing it to rain on a fire nearby, saving a forest.
Linda sews a suit that grants invisibility and uses it to stop burglars in her neighborhood.
Word of her deeds spreads, and she feels overwhelmed by her town’s expectations but remains determined.
Linda uses her powers to help local children, creating costumes for them that make their dreams come true.
A villain learns about her powers and tries to steal her creations, but Linda cleverly outsmarts him with a deceptive story she writes.
With the villain defeated, the community celebrates Linda's courage and talents at a peaceful gathering in her honor.

ending: Underneath her unassuming appearance, Linda Anderson proved that heroes come in all ages and hobbies.
moral: Never underestimate the power of creativity and the strength of community.
